becomeMember.title: Tech Generation - Become a member
becomeMember.personalDataDescription: Please, fill in the missing information.
becomeMember.enterCodeDescription: 6-digit confirmational code was just sent to the following email:
becomeMember.paymentDescription: What is entrance fee & contribution fee?
becomeMember.paymentTerms: Terms and Conditions agreement can help protect you against a wide variety of legal actions, from litigious users and customers.
becomeMember.willCostDescription: This includes entrance fee (1.00 UAH), contribution fee (1.00 UAH), and ApplePay fee (0.30 UAH).
becomeMember.successDescription: We are thrilled that you’ve decided to join our corporation as our new marketing executive! As per our previous discussion, you will need to meet with our marketing director and our CEO on your first day.
